alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:51PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN BENTON...WESTERN WASHINGTON...ADAIR AND SOUTHEASTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CST... At 1051 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Maryetta, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Prairie Grove... Lincoln... Westville... Watts... Adair State Park... Christie... Cincinnati... Maryetta... Cookson... Cherokee Landing State Park... Bunch... Baron... Eldon... Proctor... Walnut Grove... Savoy... Ballard... Wedington... Rhea... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
